name: Hidden Object: Tracks of Terrorin the world Premium
summary: You’ve been hired for your most difficult case – stopping the fearsome figure of a headless knight, bent on terrorizing the city. The De Lupe is said to have stolen his sword in order to unleash his angry spirit – but could there be something more mysterious happening in this beautiful village? Follow the clues that lead to De Lupe disappearance – and discover the dark secret behind the infamous Fire Knight - before it’s too late!
